PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00592011-02-03,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Asbestos Products Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the ASBESTOS PRODUCTS REGULATIONS, in order to make them consistent with the new Canada Consumer Product Safety Act, which comes into force on June 20, 2011. Section 2 will be replaced and sections 3 and 4 amended. Other amendments are included as requested by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0023 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
AttachmentsAttachment
